info.title: KORONA.cloud API v3
info.description: Our api provides access to our cloud services

tags.name: accounts
tags.description: This API category refers to the management of "accounts" in accounting, wich refer to the financial records that track the transactions of a business.

tags.name: additional receipt info types
tags.description: This API category refers to the management of additional information types that can be included in receipts.

tags.name: assortments
tags.description: This API category refers to the management of assortments, which are collections of related products that are sold together.

tags.name: ticketing
tags.description: This API category refers to the management of ticketing for events or other activities.

tags.name: cashier roles
tags.description: This API category refers to the management of different roles and permissions for cashiers in a point-of-sale system.

tags.name: cashiers
tags.description: This API category refers to the management of cashiers, including their login credentials and other related details.

tags.name: cashier verification requirements
tags.description: This API category refers to the management of requirements for cashiers on a point-of-sale system for example, verifying the identity or age of a customer.

tags.name: commodity groups
tags.description: This API category refers to the management of groups of related products or services.

tags.name: contra accounts
tags.description: This API category refers to the management of contra accounts, which are used to offset the balance of other accounts.

tags.name: cost centers
tags.description: This API category refers to the management of cost centers, which are used to track expenses related to specific departments or projects.

tags.name: coupons
tags.description: This API category refers to the management of coupons, including their codes, names, and other related details.

tags.name: currencies
tags.description: This API category refers to the management of different currencies and their names, symbols, denominations and exchange rates.

tags.name: customer display configurations
tags.description: This API category refers to the management of settings for customer-facing displays, such as those used in a retail setting.

tags.name: customer groups
tags.description: This API category refers to the management of groups of customers with similar characteristics, such as their buying habits or demographics.

tags.name: customer orders
tags.description: This API category refers to the management of orders placed by customers, including their details and related information

tags.name: customers
tags.description: This API category refers to the management of customer information, including their contact details and other settings, such as the use of an email for digital receipt.

tags.name: data exchange configurations
tags.description: This API category refers to the management of data exchange configurations.

tags.name: delivery notes
tags.description: This API category refers to the management of delivery notes, which are documents used to confirm the delivery of goods or services. This feature requires the use of KORONA.invoicing.

tags.name: device configuration variables
tags.description: This API category refers to the management of settings and configurations for hardware devices used in a point-of-sale system.

tags.name: discount configurations
tags.description: This API category refers to the management of settings for different types of discounts that can be applied to purchases.

tags.name: dispatch notifications
tags.description: This API category refers to the management of notifications related to the dispatch of goods or services. This feature requires the use of KORONA.retail.

tags.name: economic zones
tags.description: This API category refers to the management of different economic zones, such as those with different tax rates or trade regulations.

tags.name: external system calls
tags.description: This API category refers to the ability to make calls to external systems, such as payment processors or shipping providers.

tags.name: fiscal units
tags.description: This API category refers to the management of fiscal units, which are used to track financial transactions for tax reporting purposes.

tags.name: images
tags.description: This API category refers to the management of images used in various contexts, such as product listings or marketing materials.

tags.name: info texts
tags.description: This API category refers to the management of text-based information used in various contexts, such as on receipts or in marketing materials.

tags.name: inventories
tags.description: This API category refers to the management of inventory levels for different products or services. This feature requires the use of KORONA.retail.

tags.name: item sequences
tags.description: APIs related to the management of item sequences. (KORONA.food required)

tags.name: korona account
tags.description: APIs related to the management of the KORONA.studio account, which includes the company contact details and other settings.

tags.name: languages
tags.description: APIs related to the management of the accounts languages.

tags.name: loyalty cards
tags.description: APIs related to the management of the loyalty cards.

tags.name: messages
tags.description: APIs related to the management of messages thad can be send to the point-of-sale system.

tags.name: number range configurations
tags.description: This API category refers to the management of number range configurations, which are used to trigger different actions if matching codes are scanned on the point-of-sale system

tags.name: order portal suppliers
tags.description: This API category refers to the management of order portal suppliers.

tags.name: organizational units
tags.description: APIs related to the management of organizational units

tags.name: payment method categories
tags.description: APIs related to the management of payment method categories

tags.name: payment methods
tags.description: This API category refers to the management of payment methods, such as cash, credit cards, prepaid cards, and other.

tags.name: pos button layouts
tags.description: This API category refers to the management of settings and configurations for button layouts on the point-of-sale user interface.

tags.name: pos page layout configurations
tags.description: This API category refers to the management of settings and configurations for page layout configurations on the point-of-sale user interface.

tags.name: pos profiles
tags.description: This API category refers to the management of settings and configurations of different point-of-sale system profiles, which include their button and page layouts.

tags.name: points of sale
tags.description: This API category refers to the management of point-of-sale systems and their related details.

tags.name: price groups
tags.description: This API category refers to the management of price groups and their related details.

tags.name: price rules
tags.description: This API category refers to the management of price rules and their related details.

tags.name: prices
tags.description: This API category refers to the management of product prices and their related details.

tags.name: products
tags.description: This API category refers to the management of products and their related details.

tags.name: production types
tags.description: This API category refers to the management of production types and their related details. Production types are a kind of action thad can be assigned to products, buttons or can be triggert by a action on the point of sale system.

tags.name: promotions
tags.description: This API category refers to the management of promotions and their related details.

tags.name: receipt layout configurations
tags.description: This API category refers to the management of receipt layouts and their related details.

tags.name: receipts
tags.description: This API category refers to the retrieval and query of receipts, including their booking time, sales items, and other related details.

tags.name: rentals
tags.description: This API category refers to the management of rentals. This feature requires the use of KORONA.invoicing.

tags.name: report files
tags.description: This API category refers to the management and configuration of report files that can be produced from receipts and their sales items.

tags.name: revenue accounts
tags.description: This API category refers to the management of revenue accounts, which are used to track the income earned by a business through the sale of goods or services.

tags.name: sales taxes
tags.description: This API category refers to the management of sales taxes, including their economic zone, tax-rate and other related details.

tags.name: sectors
tags.description: This API category refers to the management of sectors of related products or services, including their sales-taxes.

tags.name: special price configurations
tags.description: This API category refers to the management of special prices, which are used to configure time based advertising prices.

tags.name: statistics
tags.description: This API category refers to the retrieval and query of statistics, including revenue data, top sellers, and other related details.

tags.name: stock adjustments
tags.description: APIs related to the management of stock adjustments, which are used to adjust inventory items for a store or a warehouse.

tags.name: stock orders
tags.description: APIs related to the management of stock orders, which are used to order new inventory items for a store or a warehouse. This feature requires the use of KORONA.retail.

tags.name: stock receipts
tags.description: APIs related to the management of stock receipts, which are used to record the reception of new inventory items. This feature requires the use of KORONA.retail.

tags.name: store orders
tags.description: APIs related to the management of store orders, which are used to order items for a specific store or location.

tags.name: suppliers
tags.description: APIs related to the management of suppliers, which includes the creation, modification, and retrieval of supplier information.

tags.name: tags
tags.description: APIs related to the management of tags, which are used to categorize products and other entities in the system.

tags.name: time tracking
tags.description: APIs related to the management of time tracking, which includes the creation, modification, and retrieval of time tracking information.

tags.name: user roles
tags.description: APIs related to the management of user roles, which includes the creation, modification, and retrieval of user roles information.

tags.name: users
tags.description: APIs related to the management of users, which includes the creation, modification, and retrieval of user information.

tags.name: voucher configurations
tags.description: APIs related to the management of voucher configurations, which includes the creation, modification, and retrieval of voucher configuration information.

tags.name: vouchers
tags.description: APIs related to the management of vouchers, which are used to offer discounts or promotions to customers.

tags.name: voucher transactions
tags.description: APIs related to the management of voucher transactions, which includes the creation, modification, and retrieval of voucher transaction information.

parameters.name: koronaAccountId
parameters.description: account id of the KORONA.cloud account

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: number of the page to fetch

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: amount of objects to return per page

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: attribute to sort by (multiple separated by comma; max. 5)

parameters.name: revision
parameters.description: last revision number, objects with a greater revision than this will be returned

parameters.name: includeDeleted
parameters.description: indicates deleted objects should be loaded or not (default: false)

429.description: Too many requests in a specified period

204.description: Request successful, but the list is empty. Either there is in general no object on the list or a set filter/restriction in querystring doesn't match any object.

post.description: adds a batch of new accounts

parameters.name: koronaAccountId
parameters.description: account id of the KORONA.cloud account

parameters.name: upsert
parameters.description: when set to true, updates the object instead of generating a already-exists-error; deprecated, use writeMode ADD_OR_UPDATE instead

parameters.name: writeMode
parameters.description: DEFAULT = insert; ADD_OR_UPDATE = insert or update, overwrite all non-null fields; ADD_OR_REPLACE = insert or update, overwrite all fields

requestBody.description: array of new accounts

429.description: Too many requests in a specified period

delete.description: deletes a batch of accounts

parameters.description: account id of the KORONA.cloud account

requestBody.description: array of existing accounts (id or number required)

net.description: base price: price of the receipt or itemrow, excluded all taxes. example: every tax excluded
